Detailed Description

Group of neurons sharing similar properties.

All the neurons of the group share the same configurators for the neural data (Group::data_cfg_) and activation (Group::nrn_act_cfg_) mechanisms.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef std::list<boost::shared_ptr<NeuronInterface> > Group::ListNrnType

Type redefinition for the list of pointers to the neurons.
